title: Andoid 8.0 Update: When does my phone get Oreo?
description: ![AndroidOreo]()##  Nokia Android 8.0 update2017 has been a huge year for the Nokia brand, and its owners HMD. Along withresurrecting the iconic 3310 in slightly shonky fashion, it has produced abunch of pretty decent Android phones. The [Nokia3](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/nokia-3), [Nokia5](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/nokia-5) and [Nokia6](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/nokia-6) hit shelves earlier in theyear and have all been confirmed to be getting the Oreo update at some point.> We are on it[@nokiamobile](https://twitter.com/nokiamobile?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw) .[@Android](https://twitter.com/Android?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw)[#Oreo](https://twitter.com/hashtag/Oreo?src=hash&ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw)maturing nicely on[#Nokia8](https://twitter.com/hashtag/Nokia8?src=hash&ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw) ,will release when perfect. Stay tuned![pic.twitter.com/wPxEGA4rJn](https://t.co/wPxEGA4rJn)>> — Juho Sarvikas (@sarvikas) [September 16,2017](https://twitter.com/sarvikas/status/909048237398675456?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw)The flagship [Nokia 8](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/nokia-8) will begetting it too, and we’ve already seen some images of a Nokia 8 running a betaversion of the software.**Related:[Samsung Galaxy S9](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/samsung-galaxy-s9-release-date-specs-features-price-uk-3266552)****Has your phone got the Android 8.0 Oreo update yet? Tweet us@trustedreviews**
